'''Norgund''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

An entirely honest merchant, Norgund specializes in providing tools with a less-than-stellar reputation that are popular among thieves and other ne'er-do-wells.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Lockpicks and other thieving supplies
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           = * He carries [Norgund's Key](/norgundsKey/), which can be used to open the nearby chest.
}}
[Category:Port Maje characters](/categoryPortMajeCharacters/)
[Category:Port Maje Harbor characters](/categoryPortMajeHarborCharacters/)
